review.title: “OK Company with Extremely High Turnover”
review.pros: Pros – Excellent learning opportunity and chance for career advancement (if you don't get randomly laid off)
review.cons: Cons – The turnover here is crazy... In less than a year the company hired and fired no less than 6 people for the same exact position. Then I too was laid off and told by the CEO that she did not want to discuss the reason why.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Vet your selections a bit more before making them an offer... It's pretty messed up to offer someone a position, have then leave their current position then lay them off a week or two into their new job.
